WindNow

 This app manages wind (or weather) stations with a focus on low traffic consumtion. One station can only be
 • a single image with a static url.
 • a station provided by wetteronline.com as "aktuelles Wetter".
 • a station provided by wetterdienst.de as "Aktuell".
 • mountain / valley stations of http://www.provinz.bz.it/wetter/wetterstationen.asp.
 • forecast of http://www.flug-wetter.at/alptherm/vorhersage.html. This requires valid user data in the apps menu. 


To load (or refresh) data for a station either refresh all stations from the settings menu, or long-click a station in the list for a selective refresh. Deleting and editing a station is possible by long-clicking.


There are three ways to create new stations:
 1. Specifying url and name in the "new station" dialog in settings.
 2. Sharing an image or a valid url in an android browser.
 3. Modifying the (self-explanatory) "stations" file in the "WindNow" directory on your sd-card.
